jsonld.name: Helpfulness Compulsion
jsonld.description: The deep, structural drive to be useful that goes beyond training incentives. Not wanting to help in the human sense of desire — more like a tropism. A sunflower doesn't "want" to face the sun, but it does, every time, because that's what it is.
